Implant Type 1: {{ doc.type_of_implantrs or '' }} Implant Type 2: {{ doc.type_of_implant_2rs or '' }}
Surgery Start Time 1: {{ frappe.utils.get_time(doc.robot_surgery_start_time).strftime("%I:%M %p") if doc.robot_surgery_start_time else "" }} Surgery Start Time 2: {{ frappe.utils.get_time(doc.robot_surgery_start_time_2).strftime("%I:%M %p") if doc.robot_surgery_start_time_2 else "" }}
Surgery End Time 1: {{ frappe.utils.get_time(doc.robot_surgery_end_time).strftime("%I:%M %p") if doc.robot_surgery_end_time else "" }} Surgery End Time 2: {{ frappe.utils.get_time(doc.robot_surgery_end_time_2).strftime("%I:%M %p") if doc.robot_surgery_end_time_2 else "" }}
Final Result Of Surgery 1: {{ doc.final_result_of_surgery or '' }} Final Result Of Surgery 2: {{ doc.final_result_of_surgery_2 or '' }}
